A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite what many people say\, TLJ completely honors and aligns with past Star Wars movies. Most importantly\, he put the saga back on track for what it means to use The Force and be a Jedi. I wish more people appreciated this installment. Thereâ(TM)s a lot of great stuff to think about.
